  • All Classes
 

Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAsset
    Base interface for all the assets you can download.
    IAssetManager
    Provides access to Cursors over the Asset data.
    IAssetPermission
    Encapsulates the backplane Download Permission Response for an asset.
    IAssetPermission.IAssetDownloadsPerDevice
    Interface for retrieving information on number of Asset downloads on a particular device of the account.
    IAssetPermission.IDownloadsPerDevice
    Interface for retrieving information on number of downloads on a particular device of the account.
    IAssetProvider
    Provides access to Asset data through a Cursor.
    IBackgroundProcessingManager
    Interface which should be implemented to provide registration of background processing functions to the SDK.
    IBackplane
    Provides access to the Backplane controlled settings and to the public Backplane API's.
    IBackplane.IBackplaneDevicesObserver
    Interface for receiving the array of devices registered on the Backplane for the current user.
    IBackplaneDevice
    Encapsulates how the Backplane identifies a device.
    IBackplaneSettings
    Provides access to the current Backplane configuration and the Backplane Controlled Settings.
    IDASHManifestRenditionSelector
    Virtuoso will automatically select video renditions based on the supplied filters and maximum bitrate provided during asset creation.
    IDASHManifestRenditionSelector.IDASHVideoRendition
    Each rendition is represented by an IDASHVideoRendition object containing all the key parameters from the DASH Representation object in the manifest.
    IEvent
    The interface to Events which are generated by the SDK for the purpose of analytics.
    IFile
    The interface to flat files in Virtuoso.
    IForegroundNotificationProvider
    This interface defines the methods which must be provided for the client application to generate update notifications from within the service process.
    IHLSManifestRenditionSelector
    Virtuoso will automatically select video renditions based on the supplied filters and maximum bitrate provided during asset creation.
    IHLSManifestRenditionSelector.IHLSVideoRendition
    Each rendition is represented by an IHLSVideoRendition object containing all the key parameters from the HLS STREAM definition in the manifest.
    IIdentifier
    The interface to identify assets in Virtuoso
    ILanguageSettings
    Allows the client to configure which languages will be included in downloads for HLS and DASH asset types The currently configured LanguageSettings can be accessed through the ISettings.getLanguageSettings call in ISettings.
    IManifestParserObserver
    This interface provides a configurable mechanism for altering the output of the manifest parser before the Download 2 Go SDK begins downloading an asset.
    IMimeTypeSettings  
    INetworkCapabilities
    The NetworkCapabilities class provides a method to check the available transport being used by the SDK.
    IPrepareURLObserver
    This interface provides a configurable mechanism to allow modification of the request URLs for segments or keys (HLS) prior to requests being made.
    IPushRegistrationObserver
    Enables clients to determine whether a Push Service (Firebase Cloud Messaging - FCM or Amazon Device Messaging - ADM) is available.
    IQueue
    Provides access to the Assets that are queued for downloads.
    IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver
    Result of permission check on adding Asset to queue.
    ISegment
    Interface to individual segments.
    ISegmentedAsset
    Interface to segmented assets in Virtuoso.
    ISegmentedAssetFromParserObserver
    Interface for receiving notification when a ISegmentedAsset has been created from a parsed manifest
    IService
    Some calls within Virtuoso require direct communication with the background download service.
    IService.IConnectionObserver
    Observer for when the service connects or disconnects.
    ISettings
    Provides access to the settings which can be configured by the client.
    Observers.IBackplaneObserver
    Interface for receiving callbacks concerning the Backplane.
    Observers.IConnectivityObserver
    The IConnectivityObserver provides a method to observe the connectivity states that the SDK is using to determine when download is possible.
    Observers.IEngineObserver
    Interface for receiving callbacks about status and settings.
    Observers.IObserver
    The base Virtuoso Observer interface.
    Observers.IQueueObserver
    Callbacks about changes in the download queue
    Observers.ISubscriptionObserver Deprecated.
    subscriptions are no longer supported
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AncillaryFile
    Class representing ancillary file associated with an asset.
    EngineObserver
    Provides a base class implementation of the IEngineObserver interface, making private implementation of interface methods optional.
    IAssetPermission.PermissionCode
    Provides permission codes for determining if the download is permitted or not.
    Observers
    Observers used to receive callbacks concerning Virtuoso's download engine (Observers.IEngineObserver), the communication with the Download2Go Backplane (Observers.IBackplaneObserver), changes to the Download Queue (Observers.IQueueObserver), Subscriptions (Observers.ISubscriptionObserver) and SDK monitored connectivity (Observers.IConnectivityObserver)
    QueueObserver
    Provides a base class implementation of the IQueueObserver interface, making private implementation of interface methods optional.
    SegmentedParserError
    Defines the possible errors that can be returned when creating a ISegmentedAsset from a manifest.
    Virtuoso
    The main class for interacting with Virtuoso
    Use this class to: Create concrete implementations of Virtuoso asset interfaces Enqueue Assets for download Register observers for notification of Virtuoso events
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IMimeTypeSettings.ManifestType
    Manifest type enumeration, used in settings for filtering by mime type.
    IMimeTypeSettings.SegmentType
    Segment type enumeration, used in settings for filtering by mime type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AssetNoLongerAvailableException
    This exception can be thrown to indicate that asset details have been requested by the engine for an asset which is no longer available in the catalog.
    BackplaneException
    Thrown when there is a problem with the Backplane settings
    ClientException
    Thrown by implementations in the client package when an error is encountered
    ServiceException
    Thrown when an error occurs with the service connection.
